Package org.jamsim.ascape.r

Ascape/R interface classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AscapeGD
    An R graphics device in the Ascape Swing MDI.
    PanelViewDatasetProvider
    Fetches the dataset for run 0 from a OutputDatasetProvider each time PanelViewDatasetProvider.getPanelView() is called.
    PanelViewJGraphicsDevice
    Executes a series of commands in R each time PanelViewJGraphicsDevice.getPanelView() is called.
    PanelViewLazyDatasetProvider
    Fetches an REXP by evaluating a given R command, uses it to produce an REXPDatasetProvider and uses that to create a table to display in a PanelView when PanelViewLazyDatasetProvider.getPanelView() is first called.
    PanelViewRTextCommand
    Executes an command in R each time PanelViewRTextCommand.getPanelView() is called.
    RFileInterface
    Handles the opening, display, execution and saving of R files in the GUI.
    ScapeRInterface
    Exposes scape specific R functionality for a particular scape, as well as general R functionality.
    ScapeRListener
    R related operations performed on scape events.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RLoader
    Create an RSwingConsole, load and initialise R, and add the console to the Ascape GUI.

Package org.jamsim.ascape.r Description

Ascape/R interface classes.
Author:
Oliver Mannion
